title: Patch 7.1 resolution bug
body: Apparently a spam with "This is a current issue per the service status guide. As a workaround, press Alt+Enter to get back in game until it's fully resolved. I hope that helps!" on every discussion isn't helping its been almost 10 hours now and the problem is still right there and nothing is fixed. Does anyone know when this problem is going to be solved ?

replies.body: Our teams are still looking into the issue to find a proper solution. Right now I can't provide an ETA on that solution, but if you have any other questions, let me know.
i have the same problem and i can't solve it plz fix it fast
